Random_Position_Patch.generator module

class Random_Position_Patch.generator.Generator(patch_size, input_dim=100, output_dim=3, k=0.5)[source]

Bases: Module

A simple generator network (consisting of five layers) for creating adversarial patches of different sizes.

patch_size

Desired output patch size (e.g., 16, 32, 64, 80).

Type:

int

k

Scaling factor used in the final tanh-based thresholding.

Type:

float

model

The sequential model composed of ConvTranspose2d layers.

Type:

nn.Sequential

build_layers(input_dim, output_dim, patch_size)[source]

Builds a series of layers based on the patch size.

Parameters:

  • input_dim – number of input channels.

  • output_dim – number of output channels.

  • patch_size – output patch size.

Returns:

list of nn.Module layers.

make_layer(in_channels, out_channels, kernel_size, stride, padding)[source]

Creates a ConvTranspose2d + BatchNorm + ReLU block.

forward(x)[source]

Forward pass through the generator.

threshold(x)[source]

A tanh-based transformation to constrain pixel values.

static weights_init(m)[source]
reset_weights()[source]

Reset the weights of the model.
